title: Setup Wizard
readyToUse: Your Burndler instance is ready to use!

languageStep.title: System Language
languageStep.description: Select your preferred language for the Burndler interface

configStep.title: System Configuration
configStep.description: Configure your organization and system settings to complete the setup.
configStep.defaultNamespaceHelp: Used for container and service prefixes
configStep.retentionHelp: How long to keep build artifacts

configSummaryItems.companyProfile: Company profile will be set up with your organization name
configSummaryItems.namespace: System will use the specified namespace for all deployments
configSummaryItems.buildSystem: Build system will be configured with your performance settings
configSummaryItems.cleanup: Cleanup policies will be applied to manage storage

errors.namespaceInvalid: Namespace can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid notification email address

adminStep.title: Create Admin Account
adminStep.description: Create the initial administrator account to manage your Burndler system.

adminReady.title: Admin Account Ready
adminReady.description: An admin account already exists in the system. You can proceed to the next step.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long

finalizing.title: Finalizing Setup...
finalizing.description: Please wait while we complete your system configuration.

success.title: Setup Complete!
success.description: Your Burndler system has been successfully configured and is ready to use.
success.nextStepsAuth: You can now access your dashboard and start managing your Docker Compose deployments.
success.nextStepsLogin: Please log in with your admin credentials to access the dashboard.

errors.missingConfig: System configuration data is missing. Please go back and complete the configuration step.
errors.setupFailed: Failed to complete setup. Please try again.
